title: This Avengers: Age of Ultron Gag Reel Is Full of Superhero Kissing
content: Marvel has released another Avengers: Age of Ultron gag reel and this one comes with way more kissing! In the one-minute video, there's not only a ton of adorable superhero dancing, but also more than a fair share of almost-kissing, including between Thor and Vision, Captain America and Iron Man -- and even Ultron and Black Widow!
